Before Flight: Check landing gear lights and pins
Enter route by selecting blank area and inputting waypoint OR selecting MCDU LIST then AIR
Press TO/GA button on side of power levers
Press FCU HDG 2 times to reset FD
Check PFD showing GA - HDG - ALT SEL
Push altimeter knob to set STD
Check PFD showing LNAV - ALT - VNAV
